metadata.title: CVE-2019-14876 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In the __lshift function of the newlib libc library, all versions prior to 3.3.0 (see newlib/libc/stdlib/mprec.c), Balloc is used to allocate a big integer, however no check is performed to verify if the allocation succeeded or not. The access to b1 will trigger a null pointer dereference bug in case of a memory allocation failure.

criterions.comment: newlib package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
